name: College Website UI Kit
description:
The official website of a college, is its face. It needs to be formal and representative of the collegeâ€™s decorum and aesthetics .The IITR Website UI Kit includes UI components, templates, best practices, and other resources for creating your own college website.


Our website is built on an automated Content Management System, developed by us students of Information Management Group, IIT Roorkee to be used by faculty and administrative personnel. Keeping this in mind, all the components are minimal, adaptive, responsive and multipurpose


During the revamp process, we laid a special stress on accessibility and hence all our design components are accessible. The color palette is in compliance with our logo but you can easily switch it as per your convenience.


Feel free to copy this file and experiment with it. Would love to hear some feedback and see your versions! :))
